sso.auth0LoginFailed: Gelitaanku fashilmay. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
sso.ssoSignupInfo: Waxaan horay u buuxinay macluumaadkaaga akoonkaaga bulshada. Fadlan dhamaystir goobaha hadhay.

accountLinking.accountLinkingRequired: Isku xirka akoonku wuu loo baahan yahay
accountLinking.accountLinkingDescription: Waxaan helnay akoon horay u jiray oo leh email-ka {{email}}. Ma jeclaan lahayd inaad ku xirto akoonkaaga {{newProvider}}?
accountLinking.verifyPasswordDescription: Fadlan geli furaha sirtaada si aad u xaqiijiso in kani yahay akoonkaaga oo aad ku xirto akoonkaaga {{newProvider}}.
accountLinking.accountLinkedSuccessfully: Akoonta si guul leh ayaa loo xiray!
accountLinking.accountLinkingFailed: Isku xirka akoonta ayaa fashilmay. Fadlan mar kale isku day.

avatar.photoLibraryPermissionDenied: Ruqsadda maktabadda sawirrada waa la diiday

passwordManager.savePrompt: Aaladaadu waxay ku siinin doontaa inaad si ammaan ah u kaydo furahan sirta
passwordManager.autofillHint: Isticmaal Face ID/Touch ID ama maamulaha furayaasha aaladaada si otomaatig ah ugu buuxiso aqoonsiga
passwordManager.biometricHint: Daar xaqiijinta bayometriska ee goobaha aaladaada si ammaan leh ugu buuxiso otomaatigga
